channel.title: CVE Feed for suse -- postgresql-init
channel.description: The latest CVEs for suse -- postgresql-init

item.title: CVE-2017-14798|2024-09-16T19:20:37.635Z -- suse -- postgresql-init
item.description: A race condition in the postgresql init script could be used by attackers able to access the postgresql account to escalate their privileges to root.
